description: Firefighters and rescue workers rushed to tackle the blazes amid soaring winds and heat.
title: Forest fires kill at least six in Ukraine's Luhansk region
title_page: Forest fires kill at least six in Ukraine's Luhansk region - BBC News
maintext: Fires "erupted quite strangely for us", he wrote. Officials had written to separatists nearby to ensure they were not attacked as they tackled the blazes but "they could not give any security guarantees", Mr Haydar alleged.
